description.value: All configurations have root module Checker.

property.name: localeCountry
property.default: default locale country for the Java Virtual Machine

property.name: localeLanguage
property.default: default locale language for the Java Virtual Machine

description.value: Check location of annotation on language elements.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF.
property.default: CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF.

description.value: The check does verifying that annotations are located on the same line with their targets.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, TYPECAST, LITERAL_THROWS, IMPLEMENTS_CLAUSE, TYPE_ARGUMENT, LITERAL_NEW, DOT, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF.
property.default: CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF.

description.value: This check controls the style with the usage of annotations.
Verifies that both the java.lang.Deprecated annotation is present and the @deprecated Javadoc tag is present when either is present.
Verifies that the java.lang.Override annotation is present when the {@inheritDoc} javadoc tag is present.
This check makes sure that all package annotations are in the package-info.java file.
This check allows you to specify what warnings that SuppressWarnings is not allowed to suppress.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF.
property.default: CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF.

description.value: Maintains a set of check suppressions from @SuppressWarnings annotations.

property.name: aliasList
property.type: String Set in a format of comma separated attribute=value entries. The attribute is the fully qualified name of the Check and value is its alias.

description.value: Finds nested blocks, i.
Checks for empty blocks.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, INSTANCE_INIT, STATIC_INIT, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT, ARRAY_INIT.
property.default: LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, INSTANCE_INIT, STATIC_INIT, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED.

description.value: Checks for empty catch blocks.
Checks for the placement of left curly braces ('{') for code blocks.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens ANNOTATION_DEF, CLASS_DEF, CTOR_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, ENUM_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, LAMBDA, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, METHOD_DEF, OBJBLOCK, STATIC_INIT.
property.default: ANNOTATION_DEF, CLASS_DEF, CTOR_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, ENUM_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, LAMBDA, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, METHOD_DEF, OBJBLOCK, STATIC_INIT.

description.value: Checks for braces around code blocks.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LAMBDA.

description.value: Checks the placement of right curly braces ('}') for if-else, try-catch-finally blocks, while-loops, for-loops, method definitions, class definitions, constructor definitions, instance and static initialization blocks.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT.

description.value: The check finds classes that are designed for extension (subclass creation).
Checks that a class which has only private constructors is declared as final.
Makes sure that utility classes (classes that contain only static methods or fields in their API) do not have a public constructor.
Check nested (inner) classes/interfaces are declared at the bottom of the class after all method and field declarations.
Implements Joshua Bloch, Effective Java, Item 17 - Use Interfaces only to define types.

Ensures that exception classes (classes with names conforming to some regular expression and explicitly extending classes with names conforming to other regular expression) are immutable, that is, that they have only final fields.
Checks that each top-level class, interface or enum resides in a source file of its own.
Restricts throws statements to a specified count (4 by default).
Checks visibility of class members.

property.name: immutableClassCanonicalNames
property.default: java.lang.String, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Byte, java.lang.Character, java.lang.Short, java.lang.Boolean, java.lang.Long, java.lang.Double, java.lang.Float, java.lang.StackTraceElement, java.math.BigInteger, java.math.BigDecimal, java.io.File, java.util.Locale, java.util.UUID, java.net.URL, java.net.URI, java.net.Inet4Address, java.net.Inet6Address, java.net.InetSocketAddress

description.value: Checks that array initialization contains a trailing comma.
Detects inline conditionals.
Checks that classes which define a covariant equals() method also override method equals(Object).
According to Code Conventions for the Java Programming Language , the parts of a class or interface declaration should appear in the following order:
Check that the default is after all the cases in a switch statement.
Detects empty statements (standalone ; semicolon).
Checks that any combination of String literals is on the left side of an equals() comparison.
Checks that classes that either override equals() or hashCode() also overrides the other.
Checks if any class or object member is explicitly initialized to default for its type value (null for object references, zero for numeric types and char and false for boolean.
Checks for fall-through in switch statements.
Checks that local variables that never have their values changed are declared final.
Checks that a local variable or a parameter does not shadow a field that is defined in the same class.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens VARIABLE_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, LAMBDA.

description.value: Checks that certain exception types do not appear in a catch statement.

property.name: illegalClassNames
property.default: java.lang.Throwable, RuntimeException, Error, Throwable, java.lang.Error, java.lang.RuntimeException, Exception, java.lang.Exception

description.value: Checks for illegal instantiations where a factory method is preferred.
This check can be used to ensure that types are not declared to be thrown.

property.name: illegalClassNames
property.default: java.lang.Throwable, RuntimeException, Error, Throwable, java.lang.Error, java.lang.RuntimeException

description.value: Checks for illegal tokens.
Checks specified tokens text for matching an illegal pattern from format property.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens NUM_DOUBLE, NUM_FLOAT, NUM_INT, NUM_LONG, IDENT, COMMENT_CONTENT, STRING_LITERAL, CHAR_LITERAL.

description.value: Checks that particular classes or interfaces are never used.

property.name: illegalClassNames
property.default: LinkedHashSet, java.util.HashSet, java.util.LinkedHashMap, java.util.TreeMap, HashMap, TreeSet, java.util.HashMap, TreeMap, java.util.LinkedHashSet, java.util.TreeSet, HashSet, LinkedHashMap

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, METHOD_CALL, METHOD_DEF, METHOD_REF, PARAMETER_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF.
property.default: ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, METHOD_CALL, METHOD_DEF, METHOD_REF, PARAMETER_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF.

description.value: Checks for assignments in subexpressions, such as in String s = Integer.
Checks that there are no magic numbers where a magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant.

property.name: constantWaiverParentToken
property.default: TYPECAST, METHOD_CALL, EXPR, ARRAY_INIT, UNARY_MINUS, UNARY_PLUS, ELIST, STAR, ASSIGN, PLUS, MINUS, DIV, LITERAL_NEW

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens NUM_DOUBLE, NUM_FLOAT, NUM_INT, NUM_LONG.

description.value: Checks that classes (except abstract ones) define a constructor and don't rely on the default one.
Checks that switch statement has a default clause.
Check for ensuring that for loop control variables are not modified inside the for block.
Checks for multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file.
Checks that each variable declaration is in its own statement and on its own line.
Restricts nested for blocks to a specified depth (default = 1).
Restricts nested if-else blocks to a specified depth (default = 1).
Restricts nested try blocks to a specified depth (default = 1).
Checks that the clone method is not overridden from the Object class.
Verifies there are no finalize() methods defined in a class.
Checks that there is only one statement per line.
Checks that overload methods are grouped together.
Ensures that a class has a package declaration, and (optionally) whether the package name matches the directory name for the source file.
Disallows assignment of parameters.
Checks that references to instance variables and methods of the present object are explicitly of the form this.
Restricts the number of return statements in methods, constructors and lambda expressions (2 by default).

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CTOR_DEF, METHOD_DEF, LAMBDA.

description.value: Checks for over-complicated boolean expressions.
Checks for over-complicated boolean return statements.
Checks that string literals are not used with == or !=.
Checks that an overriding clone() method invokes super.
Checks that an overriding finalize() method invokes super.
Checks for the use of unnecessary parentheses.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens EXPR, IDENT, NUM_DOUBLE, NUM_FLOAT, NUM_INT, NUM_LONG, STRING_LITERAL, LITERAL_NULL, LITERAL_FALSE, LITERAL_TRUE, ASSIGN, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR_ASSIGN, BSR_ASSIGN, BXOR_ASSIGN, DIV_ASSIGN, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD_ASSIGN, PLUS_ASSIGN, SL_ASSIGN, SR_ASSIGN, STAR_ASSIGN, LAMBDA.

description.value: Checks the distance between declaration of variable and its first usage.
Checks that a source file begins with a specified header.

property.name: charset
property.default: the charset property of the parent Checker module

description.value: Checks the header of a source file against a header that contains a regular expression for each line of the source header.

property.name: charset
property.default: the charset property of the parent Checker module

description.value: Checks that there are no import statements that use the * notation.
Checks that there are no static import statements.
Checks that the groups of import declarations appear in the order specified by the user.
Checks for imports from a set of illegal packages.
Controls what can be imported in each package and file.
Checks the ordering/grouping of imports.
Checks for redundant import statements.
Checks for unused import statements.

property.name: target
property.default: CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF

property.type: subset of tokens METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens INTERFACE_DEF, CLASS_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF.

property.type: subset of tokens LAND, BAND, LOR, BOR, BXOR.

description.value: Rationale: Abstract classes are convenience base class implementations of interfaces, not types as such.
Default pattern has the following characteristic:
Checks that class type parameter names conform to a format specified by the format property.
Checks that constant names conform to a format specified by the format property.
Checks that interface type parameter names conform to a format specified by the format property.
Check to verify lambda parameter names.
Checks that local final variable names conform to a format specified by the format property.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens VARIABLE_DEF, PARAMETER_DEF, RESOURCE.

description.value: Checks that local, non-final variable names conform to a format specified by the format property.
Checks that instance variable names conform to a format specified by the format property.
Also, checks if a method name has the same name as the residing class.
Checks that method type parameter names conform to a format specified by the format property.
The default value of format for module PackageName has been chosen to match the requirements in the Java Language specification and the Sun coding conventions.
To validate catch parameters please use CatchParameterName.
Checks that {@code static}, non-{@code final} variable names conform to a format specified by the format property.
Checks that type names for classes, interfaces, enums, and annotations conform to a format specified by the format property.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF.

description.value: A check that makes sure that a specified pattern exists, exists less than a set number of times, or does not exist in the file.
A check for detecting that matches across multiple lines.
Implementation of a check that looks for a file name and/or path match (or mis-match) against specified patterns.
A check for detecting single lines that match a supplied regular expression.
This class is variation on RegexpSingleline for detecting single lines that match a supplied regular expression in Java files.
Checks for long anonymous inner classes.
Restricts the number of executable statements to a specified limit.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CTOR_DEF, METHOD_DEF, INSTANCE_INIT, STATIC_INIT.

description.value: Checks for long source files.
Checks for long lines.
Checks the number of methods declared in each type declaration by access modifier or total count.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens CLASS_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, ENUM_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF.

description.value: Checks for long methods and constructors.
Checks for the number of types declared at the outer (or root) level in a file.
Checks the number of parameters of a method or constructor.
Checks the padding of an empty for initializer; that is whether white space is required at an empty for initializer, or such white space is forbidden.
Checks the padding of an empty for iterator; that is whether white space is required at an empty for iterator, or such white space is forbidden.
Checks for empty line separators after header, package, all import declarations, fields, constructors, methods, nested classes, static initializers and instance initializers.

property.name: tokens
property.type: subset of tokens PACKAGE_DEF, IMPORT, STATIC_IMPORT, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF.
